headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 11 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 11 airports right now. Engine anti-ice operations are flagged at Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV). Across base airports: 5 critical, 17 high, 8 medium, 9 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 19 other bases. 8 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, low cloud base and mist  — most notably around Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD). Network hotspots: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Billund (BLL/EKBI) and 6 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, snow / blowing snow and mist. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 11 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 2 km, cloud base around 200 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: mist; visibility down to 1.2 km, cloud base around 200 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa (TIA/LATI) — HIGH: strong gusts risk and 16 others. Worst affected now: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; freezing precipitation / icing risk (drivers: engine anti-ice operations, low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, low ceilings) | Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: low-visibility takeoff restrictions, runway visual range (RVR) constraints, very low visibility) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) and 5 others. Changed since last run: Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas (MAD/LEMD), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Bacău George Enescu (BCM/LRBC), Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) and 2 others.
